titleStmt.title: Enchiridium epigrammatum Latino-Anglicum. An epitome of essais, Englished out of Latin: without elucidat explications. Containing six classes or centuries of [brace] 1. Theologicals. 2. Historicals. 3. Heterogeneals. 4. Bryto-Anglicals. 5. Miscellaneals. 6. Mutuatitials. Beside a fardel of 76 fragments. / Doon [sic] by Rob. Vilvain of Excester. Price at press unbound 1s. 6d.
titleStmt.author: Vilvain, Robert, 1575?-1663.

titleStmt.title: Enchiridium epigrammatum Latino-Anglicum. An epitome of essais, Englished out of Latin: without elucidat explications. Containing six classes or centuries of [brace] 1. Theologicals. 2. Historicals. 3. Heterogeneals. 4. Bryto-Anglicals. 5. Miscellaneals. 6. Mutuatitials. Beside a fardel of 76 fragments. / Doon [sic] by Rob. Vilvain of Excester. publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R: Hodgkinsonne (for the author) and are to be sold at his house in Thames-street, neer Baynards Castle.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "7ber [i.e. September] 3"; the 4 in the date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
